name: Allele Fund

overview: Allele Fund is an investment fund which invest in high-growth healthcare and technology companies worldwide. Their aim is to invest in, build, and grow, a variety of leading international businesses which are committed to making a difference and helping people globally. The Fundâ€™s team takes significant operational roles within fund portfolio companies to steward them to success.
